sourceMeaningMnemonic: Raise your <radical>fingers</radical> to a <radical>criminal</radical> to <kanji>reject</kanji> their request to have your things. If someone is trying to steal something from you, just reject them.
meaningInfo: "Talk to the hand, I mean, fingers!" you say, <kanji>refus</kanji>ing the criminal.
readingMnemonic:
After you <kanji>refuse</kanji> him, he recites this <reading>hai</reading>ku (<ja>はい</ja>) at you: 

You are very mean / What's a criminal to do / But haiku at you.
readingInfo: You refuse to listen to any other haikus and you push your fingers into the criminal's face and walk away.
